divs: Sighting DetailsA friend and I were just sitting out on a back road drinking a beer after work,we were on top of a hill called Red Hill when we noticed a white light rise up from Roellen bottoms when it got to a certain hieght it changed to red and slowly silently flew over us . It was followed by several more that did the same. Neither of us could come up with any other explanation of what we saw except ufos. I have seen things in this area before once when I was in the bottoms . I witnessed a trio of lights in a triangular shape fly over me at what appeared to be a low altitude. I have heard one other story of a cigar shaped ufo in the area.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Dyersburg
There was one other sighting in Dyersburg on or around September 14th 1994
Summary: A friend and I watched several lights rise from a wetland they appeared to rise up red and then turnwhite as they flew over us with no sound. I
